member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo
member.summary: Provides logging functions.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Trace
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Trace level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Trace(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Trace level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.TraceException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Trace level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Debug
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Debug level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Debug(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Debug level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.DebugException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Debug level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Info
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Info level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Info(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Info level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.InfoException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Info level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Warn
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Warn level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Warn(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Warn level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.WarnException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Warn level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Error
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Error level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Error(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Error level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.ErrorException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Error level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Fatal
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Fatal level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.Fatal(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message at the Fatal level.

member.name: M:Anotar.Log4Net.LogTo.FatalException(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Writes the diagnostic message and exception at the Fatal level.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogToFatalOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Fatal.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogMinimalMessageAttribute
member.summary: Used to suppress message prefixing.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogToDebugOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Debug.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogToErrorOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Error.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogToInfoOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Info.

member.name: T:Anotar.Log4Net.LogToWarnOnExceptionAttribute
member.summary: If an occurs in the applied method then log it to Warn.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute
member.summary: Not for external use.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Annotations.StringFormatMethodAttribute.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Not for external use.
